message: Ebert says that Social Network should win the Oscar for Best Picture because, "It was not only the best film of 2010, but also one of those films that helps define a year." Agree or disagree?

I totally agree with that. I do agree that The Social Network dealt with a lot of what defines our generation, from our obsession with  societal ... garbage to motivation, trying to make your way in the world, etc, etc.
Watching the movie right now and coding along ^.^
well, I liked Inception too.. but the concept of Social network is fascinating too =)

I think Inception deserves to win. Extremely inventive and cinematic, and excellent production all around. Perhaps Social Network should win best screenplay (I haven't seen it), but just for pulling off something so epic and awesome, Inception deserves it.
